overview: Sting faces Hollywood Hogan for the vacant WCW World Heavyweight Championship. The Outsiders challenge The Steiner Brothers for the WCW World Tag Team Championship. Plus "The Total Package" Lex Luger faces "Macho Man" Randy Savage, Booker T faces Rick Martel for the WCW World Television Championship, and more!
tagline: Hogan vs. Sting II for Championship
title: WCW SuperBrawl VIII
